name: Fashion City 2
description:
Have you ever dreamed of running your own fashion boutique? Design and decorate your boutique and tailor dress for celebrities!

Rule the world of fashion and show everyone how to run a successful design studio! Do you have what it takes? Set fashion trends and go from fashion zero to fashion hero!

DECORATE YOUR FASHION BOUTIQUE
Decorate your store to be just as stylish as the fashions you’re selling so that your customers know they’re shopping in the trendiest place in the city.

DESIGN DRESSES
From glamorous dresses, jackets, to trendy shirts and shoes, hundreds of outfits lie at your fingertips. Collect design materials to create the perfect fashions that your customers will love!

FASHION TRENDS
You set the fashion trends, you decide this season’s hits and misses by the type of clothes you pick to show in your store.

HIRE TOP DESIGNERS
Hire top fashion designers to create clothes that will impress your clients!

SOCIALIZE, CONNECT, INTERACT
Meet new people and visit their shops. Connect with your friends, invite them to your shop and show them why you're the best designer in Fashion City! Design and get to the top together!
